content: single_crochet around slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 60 single_crochet round 17 chain 4 double_crochet in 2nd single_crochet from chain * chain 1 skip 1 single_crochet and double_crochet in next single_crochet* repeat between * forming 30 chain 1 spaces slip_stitch in 3rd chain of chain 4 to join and create a 31st space round 18 chain 2 * single_crochet in chain 1 space single_crochet in double_crochet * repeat between * 29 more times slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 60 single_crochet round 19 20 chain 2 single_crochet in first single_crochet and in each single_crochet around slip_stitch in top chain of chain 2 to join round 60 single_crochet fasten_off yarn finishing hide yarn ends weave ribbon through chain 1 double_crochet spaces tie ribbon ends as desired or stitch in place using a coordinating thread copyright notice permission is granted for personal noncommercial use of this pattern provided that this notice remains with it this pattern may not be published in any format including placing a copy on the internet without permission from pamala feldpausch pamalaspastime@yahoo com september 15 2008 copyright notice permission is granted for personal noncommercial use of this pattern provided that this notice remains with it this pattern may not be published in any format including placing a copy on the internet without permission from pamala feldpausch pamalaspastime@yahoo com september 15 2008
